Thanks for the screenshot, though I'm to hear this is still happening guys!  While I look into this, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out some possibilities.  This error usually occurs your connection to the patching server is blocking access, so hopefully that can help restore access.
